rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg001
rows.name:
Oh my!
Such a wonderful place!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg002
rows.name:
The lady at the inn sure knows her
stuff!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg003
rows.name:
Yes, indeed...
I must admit, it's a dramatic scene.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg004
rows.name:
Looking at it is like a spur to my
creative energy.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg005
rows.name:
Yoshitsune...
You think you'll write another play?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg006
rows.name:
Perhaps. Gazing out at a vista like this...
It's like a churning sea of possibilities.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg007
rows.name: I mean, for example...

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg008
rows.name:
A story of a woman...who took to the
skies on wings of freedom.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg009
rows.name:
Sounds way interesting!
I wanna hear more!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg010
rows.name:
Yoshitsune! You must write that story!
I can't bear it if you don't!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg011
rows.name:
Kamui... It's easier said than done.
Ideas need to crystallize a little first.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg012
rows.name:
But... Perhaps you could be my
inspiration for this story?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg013
rows.name: Inspiration?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg014
rows.name:
I mean...because you fly on wings of
freedom.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg015
rows.name:
You're wild and untameable.
And you've already got wings.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg016
rows.name: Oh... Am I now...?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg017
rows.name:
Why don't you try flying a little
for me now? Right here?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg018
rows.name:
Yes!
Of course!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg019
rows.name: What should I say to Kamui?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg020
rows.name:
Flying? From here?
Wait, can you actually fly?!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg021
rows.name: It's true that you're quite the free spirit.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg022
rows.name: What should I say to Kamui?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg023
rows.name:
Flying? From here?
I didn't think you could fly...

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg024
rows.name:
You're my kind of girl, Kamui. Living
your own way.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg025
rows.name: What shall I say to Kamui?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg026
rows.name:
You're thinking of flying from here?
I didn't even know you could fly.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg027
rows.name: You're a free spirit, Kamui. I like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg028
rows.name: What should I say to Kamui?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg029
rows.name:
What? You want to fly from here?
You can fly? Way cool.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg030
rows.name:
You don't let reality hold you back.
I guess you're a free spirit like me.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg031
rows.name:
Heh? You really didn't know I could
fly? So very silly!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg033
rows.name:
Well, it's not as though she has real
flight, like a bird flapping its wings.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg034
rows.name:
It's more like floating around on the
ether flow. Those wing-like organs
let her manipulate it.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg035
rows.name:
But unlike real flight, it's not affected
by wind or weather, so I can go
wherever I like!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg036
rows.name: So they really are wings of freedom!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg037
rows.name:
Hey, Kamui, here's an idea...
Why don't you try taking to the
skies with your Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg038
rows.name:
With my Driver?
But, Drivers can't fly!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg039
rows.name: Can't you bear them up in your arms?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg040
rows.name:
The heroine in my story was going to
soar the heavens with her loyal
companion.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg041
rows.name:
That'd be incredibly dramatic, don't
you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg042
rows.name: Now that you mention it...yes!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg043
rows.name:
If you want to take to the skies on
Kamui Airways, just call me!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg044
rows.name: Ah...I'mokay for now...

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg045
rows.name: Hmmm...nah...

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg046
rows.name: No, I don't think so.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg047
rows.name:
I laugh in the face of danger! But, no
thanks.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg048
rows.name:
What? No?!
You trembling mouse!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg049
rows.name:
I promise to try not to drop you!
I'm not all that clumsy, you know!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg050
rows.name: Hey, wait a moment.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg051
rows.name:
That would be even more dramatic.
The heroine drops her friend...
Oh, the pathos!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg052
rows.name:
Yes, the muses have called out to me,
and I've heard!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg054
rows.name: So, she will drop her friend?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg055
rows.name:
That's right. Her companion will be
dashed on the rocks below, like a bag
of wet rice.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg056
rows.name:
Now come on, Kamui. It's time you
tried taking your Driver for a spin!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg057
rows.name:
Reach the highest peak, then let them
go, into the Cloud Sea below!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg058
rows.name:
Okay!
Sounds like a great idea!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg059
rows.name: Kamui! You'd better be joking!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg060
rows.name:
Hey, not so fast! I wouldn't want to fly
without Byakko.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg061
rows.name:
There's no way you can hold up me
and furbag here.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg062
rows.name: Wait a moment!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg063
rows.name:
...I...just remembered something I have
to do. Very urgent imperial business!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg064
rows.name: W-whoa there!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg065
rows.name:
Wouldn't you rather take Yoshitsune?
I mean, you'd cramp my style.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg066
rows.name:
Come on, this isn't an offer that one
can refuse. I'm writing the ultimate
comedy here. Your help is appreciated.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg067
rows.name:
No doubt about it! I can't miss out on
the chance to be immortalized in one of
your tales, Yoshitsune.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg101
rows.name:
Of course I am!
I'm the very picture of freedom!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg102
rows.name:
Although...sometimes I wonder whether
what I have is actually real freedom.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg104
rows.name:
I mean, a Blade always shares
the fate of their Driver, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg105
rows.name:
Doesn't that mean we're kind of
tied down by our Drivers?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg106
rows.name: You can hardly call that freedom.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg107
rows.name: Kamui, you surprise me.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg108
rows.name: What? How?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg109
rows.name:
That's awfully insightful. It seems the
genius of my story has inspired you in
turn.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg110
rows.name:
I always thought that you were just
fired by raw, unthinking desires and
whimsical emotion.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg111
rows.name: Yoshitsune! You're skating on thin ice!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg112
rows.name:
I'm actually very thoughtful...
underneath...

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg113
rows.name:
Like, uh...say I've got some of my
favorite Luxurian Porridge here.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg114
rows.name: And let's say...Rex is about to eat it.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg115
rows.name: And let's say...Nia is about to eat it.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg116
rows.name: And let's say...Meleph is about to eat it.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg117
rows.name: And let's say...Zeke is about to eat it.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg118
rows.name:
My stomach says, "eat it!"... But my
conscience says, "let my Driver have it."

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg119
rows.name:
Real freedom is being able to choose
whether I sit back and let them eat it,
or ask them to let me have some.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg120
rows.name:
And that choice is up to me, Kamui.
So in a way, I'm the Driver of me!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg121
rows.name:
Being able to choose...
that's real freedom!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg122
rows.name:
Yes. You can make choices. And those
choices lead to consequences.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg123
rows.name: All of that is under your control.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg124
rows.name:
Although... I have to say I can't picture
you making either of those choices.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg125
rows.name:
If I was to bet on it, I'd have said you'd
have punched your Driver and taken
all the grub for yourself.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg126
rows.name:
Would you really consider any
other option?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg127
rows.name:
Eheheh... Realistically, that probably
is what I'd decide to go for...

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg128
rows.name:
But in the end, that just means
you're being selfish!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg129
rows.name:
Hang on, doesn't that just mean
you're being selfish?!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg130
rows.name:
But in the end, that simply means
you're being selfish!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg131
rows.name:
Hold it. Doesn't that just mean
you're being selfish?!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg132
rows.name:
W-well... Choosing to be selfish
is a kind of freedom too!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg133
rows.name:
Not being tied down by anything...
Living for myself...

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg134
rows.name:
Not doing anything nasty and boring!
Only doing fun things!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg135
rows.name: That's the sort of life I want!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg137
rows.name:
Yes, yes... You're the ideal inspiration
for my free-spirited heroine...

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg138
rows.name:
This is going to be the greatest comedy
of all time!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg139
rows.name:
Well, that settles it. I'll keep doing
whatever I want! Otherwise Yoshitsune's
story would be ruined!
